Users

ID Username Email
{{ user.userId }} {{ user.username }} {{ user.email }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from '../services/api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-users', templateUrl: './users.component.html' }) export class UsersComponent implements OnInit { users: any[] = []; constructor(private api: ApiService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.loadUsers(); } loadUsers() { this.api.getUsers().subscribe(data => { this.users = data; }); } }
